ygData.subject: Re: Damage bonus calculation
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the reply.  I am only level 17, but what should I specialize after 50?  Evoc or Alteration?  Typically  I am a healer bases cleric.  I dont use much
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the reply. I am only level 17, but what should I specialize
after 50? Evoc or Alteration? Typically I am a healer bases cleric. I
dont use much mana for offensive spells or I dont get down and dirty all to
often. I just mainly heal during a fight or after. Should I just
specialize in Alteration? Thanks

Qanin
The Rathe

> ----------
> From: Ryan Robinson[SMTP:bigsexxyryan@...]
> Reply To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:26 AM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Damage bonus calculation
>
> From: Ryan Robinson <bigsexxyryan@...>
>
> Specailization goes up like any other skill it starts off when you train
> and
> maxes out when it hits your max level points. I am 35th and have 120 in
> spec
> so far. The Special skill is seperate from normal alteration. When you
> raise
> it will saye Alteration specialization has gone up and Evok and all the
> others and so on. I have notice HUGE i mean HUGE saving in mana and being
> interrupted. Was able to get my heal off with a double damage hit from a
> SG
> of 88.
>
> well anymore questions ask away
>
> Enursin High Battle Cleric Of Black Tower Guild
>
>
>
>
> >From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Damage bonus calculation
> >Date: Wed, 30 Jun 1999 09:54:34 -0400
> >
> >From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
> >
> >Does specailization skills go up by itself?
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: The Scotts[SMTP:jtscott@...]
> > > Reply To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 5:30 AM
> > > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Damage bonus calculation
> > >
> > > From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>
> > >
> > > Basically specialization aloows you to become an expert on all of
> >you
> > > skills Abujuration,conjuration,alteration,evoketion....etc How this
> >works
> > > is when you specialize in these skills you cast them fast,use less
> mana,
> > > recover more when hit and casting,and so on..heres teh catch only one
> of
> > > these skills can be raised passed 50points, once that one skill has
> >passed
> > > 50 all the other specialized skills are capped at 50 since we are
> >clerics
> > > it
> > > only makes since to raise our healing past 50 ( I think thats
> >alteration)
> > > so
> > > what you do at 30 is put like 10-15 pts into specialize alteration
> and
> >a
> > > few pts in to the rest this allows your alteration to be ahead of all
> >teh
> > > other specializations skills so you will hit 50 pts first with
> >alteration
> > > and
> > > the others will be capped but alteration keeps gaining in pts.
> Lowering
> > > casting time,mana usage,recovery rate,and chances of not recovering
> when
> > > hit
> > > and trying to cast heals/buffs and what ever else uses alteration.
> > >
> > > Krix Mathar
> > > Guardians of Lore
> > >
> > >
> > > ----Original Message-----
> > > From: dburnette@... <dburnette@...>
> > > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>

> > > Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Damage bonus calculation
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: dburnette@...
> > > >
> > > >Just wondering... Does anyone know the formula for calculating how
> much
> > > melee damage is done based on your strength stats?
